卡片

On this page

Button 按钮 ​

常用的操作按钮。

基础用法 ​

使用 type、plain、 round和 circle来定义按钮的样式。

<template>
  <p>
    <su-button>Default</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary">Primary</su-button>
    <su-button type="success">Success</su-button>
    <su-button type="info">Info</su-button>
    <su-button type="warning">Warning</su-button>
    <su-button type="danger">Danger</su-button>
  </p>

  <p>
    <su-button plain>Plain</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary" plain>Primary</su-button>
    <su-button type="success" plain>Success</su-button>
    <su-button type="info" plain>Info</su-button>
    <su-button type="warning" plain>Warning</su-button>
    <su-button type="danger" plain>Danger</su-button>
  </p>

  <p>
    <su-button round>Round</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary" round>Primary</su-button>
    <su-button type="success" round>Success</su-button>
    <su-button type="info" round>Info</su-button>
    <su-button type="warning" round>Warning</su-button>
    <su-button type="danger" round>Danger</su-button>
  </p>

  <p>
    <su-button icon="search" circle />
    <su-button type="primary" icon="edit" circle />
    <su-button type="success" icon="check" circle />
    <su-button type="info" icon="message" circle />
    <su-button type="warning" icon="star" circle />
    <su-button type="danger" icon="trash" circle />
  </p>
</template>

禁用状态 ​

你可以使用 disabled 属性来定义按钮是否被禁用。

<template>
  <p>
    <su-button>Default</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary">Primary</su-button>
    <su-button type="success">Success</su-button>
    <su-button type="info">Info</su-button>
    <su-button type="warning">Warning</su-button>
    <su-button type="danger">Danger</su-button>
  </p>
  <p>
    <su-button disabled>Default</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary" disabled>Primary</su-button>
    <su-button type="success" disabled>Success</su-button>
    <su-button type="info" disabled>Info</su-button>
    <su-button type="warning" disabled>Warning</su-button>
    <su-button type="danger" disabled>Danger</su-button>
  </p>
</template>

图标按钮 ​

使用 icon属性来定义按钮的图标。

<template>
  <div>
    <su-button type="primary" icon="edit" />
    <su-button type="primary" icon="share" />
    <su-button type="primary" icon="trash" />
    <su-button type="primary" icon="search">Search</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary">
      Upload<su-icon icon="upload" style="margin-left: 8px" />
    </su-button>
  </div>
</template>

按钮组 ​

使用 <su-button-group> 对多个按钮分组。

<template>
  <p>
    <su-button-group disabled>
      <su-button type="primary" icon="arrow-left">Previous Page</su-button>
      <su-button type="primary">
        Next Page<su-icon icon="arrow-right" style="margin-left: 8px" />
      </su-button>
    </su-button-group>
  </p>
  <p>
    <su-button-group type="warning" size="small">
      <su-button type="primary" icon="edit" round />
      <su-button type="primary" icon="share" />
      <su-button type="primary" icon="trash" round />
    </su-button-group>
  </p>
</template>

加载状态 ​

使用 loading属性来定义按钮的加载状态。

TIP

您可以使用 loading 插槽或 loadingIcon 属性自定义您的 loading 图标

ps: loading 插槽优先级高于 loadingIcon 属性

<template>
  <div>
    <su-button type="primary" loading>Loading</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary" loading-icon="circle-notch" loading>Loading</su-button>
    <su-button type="primary" loading>
      <template #loading>
        <su-icon style="margin-right: 6px" icon="star" spin />
      </template>
      Loading
    </su-button>
  </div>
</template>

按钮尺寸 ​

使用 size属性来定义按钮的尺寸。

<template>
  <p>
    <su-button size="large">Large</su-button>
    <su-button>Default</su-button>
    <su-button size="small">Small</su-button>
    <su-button size="large" icon="search">Search</su-button>
    <su-button icon="search">Search</su-button>
    <su-button size="small" icon="search">Search</su-button>
  </p>
  <p>
    <su-button size="large" round>Large</su-button>
    <su-button round>Default</su-button>
    <su-button size="small" round>Small</su-button>
    <su-button size="large" icon="search" round>Search</su-button>
    <su-button icon="search" round>Search</su-button>
    <su-button size="small" icon="search" round>Search</su-button>
  </p>
  <p>
    <su-button size="large" icon="search" circle />
    <su-button icon="search" circle />
    <su-button size="small" icon="search" circle />
  </p>
</template>

Tag ​

可以自定义元素标签。例如，按钮，div，路由链接，nuxt 链接。

div
a 

<template>
  <su-button>button</su-button>
  <su-button tag="div" role="button" tabindex="0">div</su-button>
  <su-button type="primary" tag="a" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
    a
  </su-button>
</template>

Props ​

NameDescriptionTypeDefault
size尺寸enum - 'large'| 'default'| 'small'—
type类型enum - 'primary'| 'success'| 'warning'| 'danger'| 'info'info
plain是否为朴素按钮booleanfalse
round是否为圆角按钮booleanfalse
circle是否为圆形按钮booleanfalse
loading是否为加载中状态booleanfalse
loading-icon自定义加载中状态图标组件stringspinner
disabled按钮是否为禁用状态booleanfalse
icon按钮图标string-
autofocus是否自动聚焦(原生autofocus属性)booleanfalse
native-type原生 type 属性enum - 'button'| 'submit'| 'reset'button
tag自定义元素标签string/Componentbutton
use-throttle是否使用节流模式booleantrue
throttle-duration节流模式下，节流时间间隔(ms)number500

Events ​

NameDescriptionType
click按钮点击事件(event: MouseEvent)=> void

Slots ​

NameDescription
default默认插槽, 按钮内容
loading自定义加载图标

Expose ​

NameDescriptionType
ref按钮 html 元素Ref<HTMLButtonElement>
size按钮尺寸ComputedRef<''|'small' |'large'>
type按钮类型ComputedRef<''|'primary' |...>
disabled按钮禁用状态ComputedRef<boolean>

Props ​

NameDescriptionTypeDefault
size尺寸enum - 'large'| 'default'| 'small'—
type类型enum - 'primary'| 'success'| 'warning'| 'danger'| 'info'info
disabled按钮组是否为禁用状态booleanfalse

Slots ​

NameDescriptionSub Component
default默认插槽Button
Pager
Previous page快速开始
Next pageCollapse 折叠面板
